title: lol I'm glad that I never downloaded this FF game.

embed.description: Rumours have emerged across the internet that potentially signals a new all time low for developer square enix. The rumour that final fantasy xv a new empire, squares latest android mobile title, is an illegal ponzi scheme. After experiancing the gameplay of this FFXV title myself and seeing how the mechanics of its system work, along with news of very questions server merges.

body: Because there are tons of better games on my phone that aren't P2W. They are making millions of dollars  from this shitty game and the ads never stop on the Youtube app still lol
